nodes.long_description: 💥 Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR – La sfida di corsa definitiva! Preparati a un'avventura parkour VR ispirata a Fun Race 3D. Salta, scivola, striscia e schiva ostacoli estremi con precisione e tempismo. 🌟 Caratteristiche: 🔥 Livelli unici con scivoli, trappole rotanti e rampe 🏆 Corsi impegnativi – aste rotanti, palle, martelli oscillanti 🎮 Controlli semplici – facile da iniziare, difficile da padroneggiare ⚡ Azione frenetica e divertente 💪 Progressione basata sull'abilità – ogni livello è più difficile 🏁 Perché giocarci? ✔ Azione VR immersiva ✔ Divertente ma anche competitivo ✔ Perfetto per fan di parkour e runner ✔ Giocabile offline 🎯 Scaricalo ora e conquista la corsa a ostacoli più folle! 🚀
nodes.short_description: 🏃 Corri, salta e scivola in Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR! Sfida percorsi folli, evita martelli giganti e sopravvivi a ostacoli estremi in una corsa VR 3D piena d’azione. Testa i tuoi riflessi e abilità! 🚀

nodes.long_description: 💥 Corrida de obstáculos Wipeout VR – O desafio de corrida mais divertido! Inspirado em Corrida divertida 3D, este jogo de parkour em VR leva você por pistas insanas onde precisará saltar, deslizar e esquivar-se com precisão. 🌟 Recursos: 🔥 Níveis únicos com escorregadores, obstáculos rotativos e rampas 🏆 Desafios intensos – bastões giratórios, bolas, martelos 🎮 Controles simples – fácil de jogar, difícil de dominar ⚡ Corrida vibrante e cheia de surpresas 💪 Progressão por habilidade – cada fase mais desafiadora 🏁 Por que jogar? ✔ Ação imersiva em VR ✔ Casual, mas competitivo ✔ Ideal para fãs de parkour e corrida ✔ Offline, sem necessidade de Wi-Fi 🎯 Baixe agora e conquiste o desafio supremo! 🚀
nodes.short_description: 🏃 Corra, salte e deslize no Corrida de obstáculos Wipeout VR! Enfrente pistas insanas, desvie de martelos giratórios e sobreviva a obstáculos extremos em uma corrida 3D emocionante. Teste seus reflexos! 🚀

nodes.display_name: ワイプアウト障害ラッシュVR
nodes.long_description: 💥 ワイプアウト障害ラッシュVR – 究極のパルクールVR体験！ Fun Race 3Dに着想を得たこのゲームで、ジャンプ、スライド、回避しながら障害物を突破！ 🌟 特徴： 🔥 個性的なレベル – 回転トラップや滑り台満載 🏆 挑戦的な障害 – 回転棒、鉄球、スイングハンマーなど多数 🎮 簡単操作 – 誰でも遊べてマスターは難しい ⚡ 驚きと楽しさが詰まった高速レース 💪 実力で進行 – 難易度が段階的に上昇 🏁 遊ぶ理由： ✔ 没入感のあるVRアクション ✔ カジュアルでも競技性あり ✔ パルクール/ランゲーム好きに最適 ✔ オフライン対応 🎯 今すぐダウンロードして、究極の障害ラッシュを突破！🚀
nodes.short_description: 🏃 ワイプアウト障害ラッシュVRで走って、ジャンプして、スライド！過激な障害物を避け、巨大ハンマーを回避し、スリリングなVRランナーに挑戦。3Dレースで反射神経を試そう！🚀

nodes.long_description: 💥 Corrida de obstáculos Wipeout VR – O desafio de corrida mais divertido! Inspirado em Corrida divertida 3D, este jogo de parkour em VR leva você por pistas insanas onde precisará saltar, deslizar e esquivar-se com precisão. 🌟 Recursos: 🔥 Níveis únicos com escorregadores, obstáculos rotativos e rampas 🏆 Desafios intensos – bastões giratórios, bolas, martelos 🎮 Controles simples – fácil de jogar, difícil de dominar ⚡ Corrida vibrante e cheia de surpresas 💪 Progressão por habilidade – cada fase mais desafiadora 🏁 Por que jogar? ✔ Ação imersiva em VR ✔ Casual, mas competitivo ✔ Ideal para fãs de parkour e corrida ✔ Offline, sem necessidade de Wi-Fi 🎯 Baixe agora e conquiste o desafio supremo! 🚀
nodes.short_description: 🏃 Corra, salte e deslize no Corrida de obstáculos Wipeout VR! Enfrente pistas insanas, desvie de martelos giratórios e sobreviva a obstáculos extremos em uma corrida 3D emocionante. Teste seus reflexos! 🚀

nodes.long_description: 💥 Уничтожение препятствий VR – Безумный VR-забег с препятствиями! Вдохновлённая Веселая гонка 3D, эта игра предлагает прыжки, подкат, уклонение от ловушек и острых ощущений. 🌟 Особенности: 🔥 Уникальные уровни – вращающиеся преграды, горки, трамплины 🏆 Сложные препятствия – шары, балки, молоты 🎮 Простое управление – легко начать, трудно освоить ⚡ Яркий, быстрый и захватывающий геймплей 💪 Прогресс по навыкам – сложность растёт 🏁 Почему стоит играть? ✔ Полное погружение в VR ✔ Весело и соревновательно ✔ Подходит любителям паркура и раннеров ✔ Без интернета 🎯 Скачай сейчас и победи все препятствия! 🚀
nodes.short_description: 🏃 Беги, прыгай и скользи в Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR! Пройди безумные трассы, избегай молотов и преодолевай экстремальные препятствия. Проверь свою реакцию и ловкость в яркой 3D-гонке! 🚀

nodes.long_description: 💥 Wipeout Hindernislauf VR – Die ultimative Fun-Race-Herausforderung! Mach dich bereit für ein aufregendes VR-Parkour-Erlebnis, inspiriert von Lustiges Rennen 3D. Spring, rutsche, krieche und weiche verrückten Hindernissen aus – mit Präzision und Timing. 🌟 Spiel-Features: 🔥 Einzigartige Level mit rutschigen Rutschen, drehenden Fallen und Rampen 🏆 Spannende Kurse mit Schleudern, Kugeln, Wippen und Hämmern 🎮 Einfache Steuerung – leicht zu lernen, schwer zu meistern ⚡ Rasantes Gameplay mit Überraschungen und Herausforderungen 💪 Fortschritt durch Können – je weiter, desto schwerer! 🏁 Warum spielen? ✔ Intensives VR-Feeling ✔ Für Casual- und Wettkampfspieler ✔ Ideal für Fans von Parkour- & Laufspielen ✔ Offline spielbar 🎯 Jetzt laden & das ultimative Hindernisrennen meistern! 🚀
nodes.short_description: 🏃 Rase, spring und rutsche durch Wipeout-Hindernisrausch VR – ein actiongeladenes Parkour-Abenteuer! Weiche verrückten Hindernissen aus, überstehe Schwinghämmer und stürze dich in extreme Herausforderungen. Teste deine Reflexe und Skills in spannenden 3D-Rennen! 🚀

nodes.long_description: 💥 Carrera de obstáculos de Wipeout VR – ¡El reto de carrera más divertido! Prepárate para una épica aventura de parkour en VR, inspirada en Fun Race 3D. Salta, deslízate, arrástrate y esquiva obstáculos extremos con precisión y buenos reflejos. 🌟 Características del juego: 🔥 Niveles únicos – Con rampas, toboganes y obstáculos rotatorios 🏆 Carreras desafiantes – Esquiva martillos, bolas gigantes y barras giratorias 🎮 Controles simples – Fácil de jugar, difícil de dominar ⚡ Jugabilidad emocionante – Llena de sorpresas y diversión caótica 💪 Progresión por habilidad – Cada nivel es más difícil y adictivo 🏁 ¿Por qué jugar Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR? ✔ Acción intensa en VR ✔ Casual y competitivo a la vez ✔ Perfecto para fans del parkour y juegos de carrera ✔ No requiere conexión Wi-Fi 🎯 ¡Descárgalo ahora y domina la carrera de obstáculos más loca! 🚀
nodes.short_description: 🏃 Corre, salta y deslízate en Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR, ¡una aventura de parkour llena de acción! Esquiva obstáculos locos, martillos giratorios y sobrevive a caídas extremas en este emocionante corredor 3D en VR. ¡Pon a prueba tus reflejos y habilidades en desafíos divertidos! 🚀

nodes.display_name: Wipeout Obstacle Rush : Fun Race Parkour
nodes.long_description: 💥 Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR – The Ultimate Fun Race Challenge! 💥 Get ready for an epic parkour adventure where you’ll jump, slide, crawl, and dodge through extreme obstacle courses! Inspired by Fun Race 3D, this VR runner tests your reflexes, timing, and precision in crazy wipeout challenges. 🌟 Game Features: 🔥 Unique Levels – Each stage is packed with dynamic challenges, slippery slides, rotating obstacles, and sudden ramps to test your agility. 🏆 Challenging Obstacle Courses – Dodge spinning rods, wrecking balls, long rolls, slinger sweepers, and swinging hammers in a high-speed race! 🎮 Simple Controls – Easy to play but hard to master! Run, crawl, jump, and spin effortlessly. ⚡ Thrilling Gameplay – Race through chaotic, colorful courses filled with surprises, tricky wipeouts, and competitive fun. 💪 Skill-Based Progression – The difficulty increases making every level a new and exciting one. 🏁 Why Play Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR? ✔ Extreme VR Action – Experience the thrill of dodging, running, and jumping in immersive 3D VR. ✔ Casual Yet Competitive – Fun for everyone, but only the best can master the toughest courses. ✔ Perfect for Parkour & Running Game Fans – If you love stunt challenges, wipeout races, and obstacle runners, this is your game! ✔ Offline – No Wi-Fi required 🎯 Conquer the Ultimate Obstacle Rush! Download Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR now and prove your skills in the craziest wipeout course ever! Dodge, jump, run, and survive – the adventure starts now! 🚀
nodes.short_description: 🏃 Race, jump, and slide through Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR – an action-packed parkour adventure! Face crazy obstacle courses, dodge swinging hammers, and survive extreme wipeouts in this thrilling VR runner. Test your reflexes and skills in fun 3D racing challenges. Are you ready to conquer the ultimate obstacle rush? 🚀

node.display_name: Wipeout Obstacle Rush : Fun Race Parkour

nodes.display_name: Wipeout Obstacle Rush : Fun Race Parkour
nodes.long_description:
💥 Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR – The Ultimate Fun Race Challenge! 💥
Get ready for an epic parkour adventure where you’ll jump, slide, crawl, and dodge through extreme obstacle courses! Inspired by Fun Race 3D, this VR runner tests your reflexes, timing, and precision in crazy wipeout challenges.
🌟 Game Features:
🔥 Unique Levels – Each stage is packed with dynamic challenges, slippery slides, rotating obstacles, and sudden ramps to test your agility.
🏆 Challenging Obstacle Courses – Dodge spinning rods, wrecking balls, long rolls, slinger sweepers, and swinging hammers in a high-speed race!
🎮 Simple Controls – Easy to play but hard to master! Run, crawl, jump, and spin effortlessly.
⚡ Thrilling Gameplay – Race through chaotic, colorful courses filled with surprises, tricky wipeouts, and competitive fun.
💪 Skill-Based Progression – The difficulty increases making every level a new and exciting one.
🏁 Why Play Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR?
✔ Extreme VR Action – Experience the thrill of dodging, running, and jumping in immersive 3D VR.
✔ Casual Yet Competitive – Fun for everyone, but only the best can master the toughest courses.
✔ Perfect for Parkour & Running Game Fans – If you love stunt challenges, wipeout races, and obstacle runners, this is your game!
✔ Offline – No Wi-Fi required
🎯 Conquer the Ultimate Obstacle Rush!
Download Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR now and prove your skills in the craziest wipeout course ever! Dodge, jump, run, and survive – the adventure starts now! 🚀
nodes.short_description: 🏃 Race, jump, and slide through Wipeout Obstacle Rush VR – an action-packed parkour adventure! Face crazy obstacle courses, dodge swinging hammers, and survive extreme wipeouts in this thrilling VR runner. Test your reflexes and skills in fun 3D racing challenges. Are you ready to conquer the ultimate obstacle rush? 🚀

nodes.change_log:
* Player height bug fixed.
* Broken levels bug fixed.
* Graphics more improved.

- Crawl feature Added
- Pause Menu Added
- Reverse direction movement Added
- Spin feature removed, which was causing nausea
- Player Height adjusted
- Weird rotation removed, which was causing nausea
- All Glitches removed
- More stable frame rate achieved
- More Optimization achieved
- UI bugs fixed
